name: swalang-router
description: A powerful and flexible client-side router for Swalang applications.
author: Swalang Core Team

name: swift-fetch
description: A modern, promise-based HTTP client for Swalang, inspired by fetch.
author: Ava Sharma

name: chrono-kit
description: A comprehensive library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates in Swalang.
author: TimeKeepers Inc.

name: glimmer-ui
description: A beautiful and accessible component library for building modern Swalang interfaces.
author: DesignSys

name: quantum-state
description: A predictable state management library for Swalang, inspired by Redux and MobX.
author: Leo Chen

name: swalang-charts
description: Create beautiful and interactive charts and graphs with Swalang.
author: DataViz Co.

name: neuro-matrix
description: A lightweight and fast library for numerical computing and matrix operations in Swalang.
author: SciCompute Collective

name: env-guard
description: Load environment variables from .env files with validation.
author: SecureWorks

name: md-parser
description: A fast and extensible Markdown parser for Swalang.
author: Kenji Tanaka

name: aether-orm
description: A modern ORM for Swalang that supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite.
author: Database Innovators

name: swalang-i18n
description: A complete internationalization framework for Swalang applications.
author: GlobalizeJS

name: validator-pro
description: A library of string validators and sanitizers. From emails to credit cards.
author: Guardians of Code

name: pixel-magic
description: An easy-to-use image manipulation library for Swalang.
author: Clara Evans

name: log-sphere
description: A versatile and powerful logging utility for Swalang applications.
author: DevTools Inc.

name: cli-crafter
description: A framework for building beautiful and interactive command-line interfaces.
author: Terminal Tools
